thread.title: Tech industry lags in political transparency
thread.title_full: Tech industry lags in political transparency - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joaquin Palomino
title: Tech industry lags in political transparency
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff delivers the keynote speech at the annual Dreamforce conference at Moscone Center in San Francisco, Calif. on Wednesday, Sept. 16, 2015. Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff delivers the keynote speech at the...
While Silicon Valley firms often preach about the value of transparency, a new study finds that top tech companies are among the least open about their “dark money” political contributions — funds funneled to nonprofits that can easily mask their donors. Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff delivers the keynote speech at the annual Dreamforce conference at Moscone Center in San Francisco, Calif. on Wednesday, Sept. 16, 2015. Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff delivers the keynote speech at the...
While Silicon Valley firms often preach about the value of transparency, a new study finds that top tech companies are among the least open about their “dark money” political contributions — funds funneled to nonprofits that can easily mask their donors.
